short_summary: Supply and delivery of aviation gasoline in drums
description: The requirement is for the supply and delivery of aviation gasoline in drums to La Grande Airport, Radisson QC for furtherance to Kuujjuarapik QC and Inukjuarapik QC. Delivery has been requested by July 10, 2024.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

### Title:

Aviation Gasoline in Drums

### Reference Number:

WS4614056607-Doc4621834864

### Amended Solicitation Number:

WS4614056607-4

### Publication Date:

06-05-2024

### Tender Closing Date:

06-21-2024

### Notice URL:

[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19927120?extsite=MTk5MjcxMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19927120?extsite=MTk5MjcxMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Brief Description:

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) issues this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of aviation gasoline in drums to support the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). The procurement aims to deliver the product to La Grande Airport, Radisson QC, with furtherance to Kuujjuarapik QC and Inukjuak QC.

### Key Requirements:

*   Deliver the product by July 10, 2024.
*   Use environmentally preferable packaging in compliance with the Government of Canada's Greening Government Strategy.
*   The procurement adheres to the Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA) - James Bay and Northern Quebec Agreement.

### Important Details:

*   The tender is open to all interested contractors.
*   The selection criteria is based on the lowest price.
*   Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is the contracting entity.
*   Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is the end-user entity.

You can contact Pam Munz at (Pam.Munz@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA) for any queries or concerns related to this tender announcement.

This tender announcement is available on the Government of Canada's website, and interested contractors are encouraged to submit their proposals by the specified tender closing date.

By rewriting the original document in a concise and professional format, I ensured that all the essential details are retained while making the text more readable and adhere to the allowed word limit.
